title: Labneh with saffron-roasted grapefruit and orange

ingredients.item: 1 pink grapefruit, peeled and sliced into rounds
1 large orange, peeled and sliced into rounds

instructions.step: Prepare the labneh the evening before. Line a sieve with a piece of muslin, then tip in the yogurt. Gather the muslin together with a tie or clip and sit a small plate, with a weight on top, over the yogurt. Sit the sieve over a bowl then put in the fridge to strain overnight.

The next day, preheat the oven to 220ËšC, gas mark 7. Put the saffron in a bowl with 50ml just-boiled water. Put the sliced grapefruit and orange on a baking tray, pour over the saffron water and roast for 15-20 minutes.

Tip the labneh out of the muslin (discard the strained liquid) into a bowl, then stir in 1 tsp honey. Chop the pistachios. To serve, divide the warm fruit between plates, adding a spoonful of labneh and a sprinkling of the pistachios. Drizzle with the remaining 2 tsp honey, or more to taste.
